page.title: Linux
page.p: On Ubuntu, install VLC via apt, not snap. Then install the ASAP plugin: .
On Fedora, install VLC from RPM Fusion, then install the ASAP plugin: .
For command-line conversions (e.g. to WAV or between SAP and the tracker formats) and editing the metadata, install asapconv:
Run asapconv from the shell to see the syntax. The -o/--output option selects the output format and is mandatory.
Download the source code . Inside you will find instructions on how to build a VLC plugin, a MOC plugin, an XMMS plugin and a command-line converter asapconv.
